channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: You Can Play Chess in Hyperbolic Space Now, and It Sucks
item.description: It may not be particularly fun yet, but it's weird!

item.title: Hisense unveils 3 new TV innovations at CES 2026 — and they’re all about mind-blowing color
item.description: After revealing RGB mini-LED at CES 2025, Hisense is back with even more RGB TV innovations, including smaller screen sizes.

item.title: What are Micro RGB TVs and why are they everywhere at CES 2026?
item.description: Micro RGB TVs first arrived last year with little fanfare and a confusing name, so you may have mistaken it for other panel tech or not even noticed. That is not likely to be the case this year, though — it’s the hot new “luxury” display technology and is all over the place at CES 2026. So why do we even need these new TVs and how are they different from OLED, Micro LED and Mini LED models? Here’s how it works and how it compares. A brief history of flat panel display tech To better understand Micro RGB, it helps to see how flat panel display technology has evolved over the last 20 years. The ...

item.title: Anker's new 45W charger from CES is already $10 off
item.description: Anker rolled out a bunch of new chargers and other gear at CES 2026, including a cute one that's already on sale. The new 45W Nano charger with smart display, which is an upgrade to the existing Nano charger in Anker's lineup, is on sale for $30 right now while you can pre-order it. That's $10 off the regular MSRP, and shipments will start going out on January 20. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and auto...

item.title: Images sexuelles créées par Grok | Le régulateur britannique demande à X des explications
item.description: Le régulateur britannique des médias a demandé lundi au réseau social X d’expliquer comment il protège ses utilisateurs contre les fausses images de mineurs à caractère sexuel générées par Grok, l’assistant d’intelligence artificielle associé au réseau.

item.title: Offshore wind developers sue Trump administration for halting $25B in projects
item.description: The lawsuits seek to reverse the Department of the Interior's stop-work order which affected five offshore wind projects off the Eastern Seaboard.

item.title: Crypto thief released early thanks to Trump's First Step Act
item.description: Ilya Lichtenstein is coming home after serving time for the Bitfinex hack.

item.title: This AI-Powered Drink Machine Slops You Up Some Generative Booze
item.description: I could use a stiff serving of AI slop right about now.

item.title: Elon Musk Boasts of Dinner With Jeffrey Epstein’s ‘Best Friend’
item.description: "2026 is going to be amazing!" tweeted Musk.

item.title: GE Appliances' new Smart Refrigerator automates grocery shopping with a barcode scanner and Instacart
item.description: Smart fridges are a dime a dozen at CES, and LG and Samsung have thoroughly explored what's possible when you connect your fridge to the internet or slap a touchscreen on the front. The new GE Profile Smart Refrigerator with Kitchen Assistant GE Appliances is announcing ahead of CES 2026 doesn't reinvent the wheel in that regard, but it does include a first: a built-in barcode scanner for adding items to your shopping list.GE Appliances’ "Scan-to-List" feature uses the barcode scanner to quickly (and precisely) add items to a shareable shopping list in the company’s SmartHQ app. You can refer ...

item.title: LG’s CLOiD robot can load the washer for you, slowly
item.description: LG's CLOiD robot took the stage at CES 2026 on Monday, offering our first look at the bot in action. During LG's keynote, the company showed how CLOiD can load your washer or dryer - albeit slowly - as part of its goal of creating a "zero labor home." CLOiD waved both of its five-finger […]

item.title: LG launches yet another lighter-than-light 17-inch laptop with an RTX 5050 GPU — and I am so confused
item.description: The latest LG Gram Pro 17 pairs "Aerominum" construction with Nvidia RTX graphics, but with few clear differences from the 2025 model.

item.title: The Final ‘Greenland 2: Migration’ Trailer Promises Gerard Butler Will Save You
item.description: Technically, it's his character saving his family (again), but who better to guide survivors through the post-apocalypse?

item.title: At $50 off, the Shokz OpenRun Pro helps you stick to your new year’s goals
item.description: Getting fit is one of the most popular New Year’s resolutions, and if we’re being honest, it’s also one of the easiest to quit by week two. But with the right support, it doesn’t have to be that way this year. Earbuds like the last-gen Shokz OpenRun Pro can help keep you motivated, while their […]

item.title: Les meilleurs casques audio Bluetooth en janvier 2026 – La sélection Frandroid
item.description: Vous ne savez pas quel casque Bluetooth choisir dans cet océan de références ? Nous avons réalisé une sélection des meilleurs casques audio Bluetooth parmi tous ceux que nous avons pu tester.

item.title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
item.description: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player after Luminar's bankruptcy.

item.title: Asus’s new OLED gaming monitors will have sharper text and more accurate colors
item.description: Asus is announcing three new OLED gaming monitors at CES with "RGB stripe" technology that the company says will bring improvements to "texture clarity and color rendering consistency." With RGB stripes, which Samsung Display and LG Display (the two companies that usually provide the panels for gaming monitors) are also making a big deal about […]

item.title: A Stranger Things making-of documentary hits Netflix next week
item.description:
Netflix just announced the pending release of a Stranger Things documentary, hot on the heels of the series finale. It premieres on January 12. One Last Adventure focuses on the making of season five, so it's not a full series retrospective. This seems similar to what Disney+ does a few weeks after a popular Star Wars or Marvel show drops. Still, it's a documentary about the very last season of the show, so there's likely to be some tearful goodbyes and all of that jazz. As a matter of fact, the trailer shows plenty of hugs along with sit-down interviews.
It'll shine a light on how some of th...

item.title: How to watch the Hisense CES 2026 press conference live
item.description: Xinhua News Agency via Getty Images Hisense is typically best known for its affordable electronics and home appliances, from TVs to refrigerators. But at CES 2025, the China-based company showed off its premium side with a massive 136-inch micro LED TV — now available for a jaw-dropping $100,000. So what's in store for this year's show? New leadership, for starters. The company has two new hires, including Chief Marketing Officer Sarah Larsen and Chief Commercial Officer James Fishler. In a press release, Hisense said Fishler's experience in home entertainment, appliances and HVAC is important...

item.title: J’ai vu « la tablette la plus fine du monde » : c’est une feuille de papier
item.description: J'ai pris en main une tablette qui prétend être la plus fine du monde. L'objet attire beaucoup de regards au CES 2026, mais je ne suis pas sûr de son aspect pratique.

item.title: It looks like the end is coming for the Apple Vision Pro — I’m not even surprised
item.description: Apple is reportedly dialling back on Vision Pro production and marketing.

item.title: 2026 is the perfect year for OnePlus to release another folding phone — here's why
item.description: It’s going to be an interesting year for folding phones – here’s why OnePlus should return to the phone industry’s most exciting market.

item.title: Avec les Snapdragon X2 Plus, Qualcomm élargit l’horizon de Windows ARM
item.description: Qualcomm veut mettre des puces Snapdragon dans un maximum de PC. Jusqu'à présent, le géant américain ne proposait aux constructeurs que des modèles haut de gamme ; mais la nouvelle famille Snapdragon X2 Plus va permettre de démocratiser un peu plus Windows ARM.

item.title: Fini le chaos des câbles ? 19 associations exigent un chargeur universel pour tous les vélos électriques
item.description: Une vingtaine d'associations ont adressé une lettre à l’Union européenne afin d’adopter un chargeur universel pour vélos électriques. Les raisons invoquées : des problèmes de sécurité, d’environnement et de gestion de flottes.

item.title: Hundreds of Earthquakes Are Rocking One of Earth’s Most Dangerous Glaciers
item.description: Scientists uncover new evidence of undocumented glacial earthquakes in Antarctica.

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: The latest news, surprises, strange tech, and more
item.description: CES 2026 is here. See the latest news on bleeding-edge tech, EV advancements, and more.

item.title: Anker Nano Power Strip : cette multiprise à pince veut faire disparaître vos câbles sous le bureau
item.description: Anker profite du CES 2026 pour dévoiler une solution de charge originale : la Nano Power Strip. Équipée d'un système de fixation à pince, elle déporte une partie de ses prises sous le plateau pour libérer l'espace de travail.

item.title: Amazon just dropped the Jackery HomePower 3600 Plus to a record-low price
item.description: Get the Jackery HomePower 3600 Plus Solar Generator bundle for just $1,998.99 (46% off) at Amazon. Includes two 200W solar panels.

item.title: Motorola Razr Fold : le premier smartphone pliable au format livre de la marque en images
item.description: Alors que Motorola s'est jusqu'ici cantonné au marché des smartphones à clapet, une fuite révèle l'existence du « Razr Fold ». Ce modèle, au format livre, viendrait directement concurrencer les références de Samsung et Google dès 2026.

item.title: This Tamagotchi clone is designed to help you keep your plants alive
item.description: Tamagotchi ripoffs are alive and well at CES 2026, and SoildTech's spin on the idea is to stick a virtual pet in the dirt to help you stop killing your plants. Senso combines a plant health sensor and a Tamagotchi-like device, offering insights into the conditions of a houseplant's environment and a gamified way of keeping up with them. If a plant is in need of watering or could use some lighting adjustments, little characters will offer you quests to complete those tasks. And by taking care of your plant properly, you'll also be helping those characters' virtual home planet thrive. (A world t...

item.title: Qualcomm’s Next PC Chip Promises Even Better Battery Life Than Before
item.description: Rounding out the Snapdragon X2 lineup is a mid-range chip that hopes to outperform Intel and AMD.

item.title: Grok under investigation for sexualized deepfake generation
item.description: Foreign authorities are stepping in to investigate potentially illegal content hosting, in the midst of a mass "undressing" problem across X.

item.title: 8BitDo Ultimate 3E : la manette Xbox-PC qui va humilier la manette Elite de Microsoft
item.description: La manette parfaite existe-t-elle ? 8BitDo s'en approche dangereusement. Oubliez les gadgets inutiles, voici l'Ultimate 3E. Présentée à Las Vegas, elle embarque des joysticks TMR et une modularité exemplaire. Sur le papier, c'est un sans-faute technique.

item.title: En direct de Las Vegas pour le CES 2026 et une double Matinale Tech’ : on commence l’année sur les chapeaux de roues sur Twitch
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 5 janvier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous mardi, mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter de deux éditions spéciales CES 2026 !

item.title: The DJI Power 1000 V2 is on sale for under $400 to keep you powered up during the next storm
item.description: The DJI Power 1000 V2 is on sale at Amazon for $399 with the on-page coupon, down from the normal price of $699. That's a 43% discount.

item.title: Plier du linge, faire la cuisine et la vaisselle : un robot domestique à tout faire chez SwitchBot
item.description: Les robots n'en sont pas encore à envahir l'intérieur de nos maisons, exception faite des robots aspirateurs. Mais l'industrie veut creuser ce sillon et prépare des modèles bien plus polyvalents. C'est le cas de SwitchBot qui vient de présenter le onero H1.

item.title: Samsung redéfinit la démesure au CES 2026 avec un téléviseur Micro RGB de 130 pouces
item.description: Le géant coréen a profité du salon de Las Vegas pour dévoiler la première technologie Micro RGB en 130 pouces au monde. Plus qu'un écran, le modèle R95H se veut une œuvre d'art architecturale

item.title: Vocci's AI note-taking ring aims to do much more
item.description: One trend emerging from CES 2026 is wearable microphones you can use to dictate your thoughts. Vocci is one such gadget, a titanium ring with a single button capable of recording audio for up to eight hours on a charge. Unlike some of its competitors, Vocci isn’t just for catching your own thoughts as they spring forth from your scalp. Instead, you’ll be able to record whole conversations and meetings from the comfort of your proximal phalanx. Users can start and end recordings by double clicking the ring’s single button, while single clicks are used to mark important moments within the record...

item.title: Satya Nadella wants us to stop calling AI "slop" - good luck with that
item.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella envisions a world where AI systems will work in conjunction to produce transformative results.

item.title: Glasses-free 3D displays are making an unlikely comeback – as Samsung reveals ‘world’s first’ 6K monitor with real-time eye tracking
item.description: First, it was the 'world's first' glasses-free PC handheld in 2025, and now, it's the 'world's first' glasses-free 3D 6K gaming monitor from Samsung.

item.title: Amazon retire près de 150 € sur le dernier Surface Laptop 13 de Microsoft, un ordinateur portable performant sous Snapdragon X Plus
item.description: Compact, léger et facile à glisser dans un sac, le Microsoft Surface Laptop 13 (2025) représente une bonne affaire pour ceux qui veulent un ultraportable élégant et pratique à transporter au quotidien. Bonne nouvelle, il s'affiche à un prix plus avantageux sur Amazon : 968,81 euros contre 1 099 euros à sa sortie.

item.title: Audeze Maxwell 2 : la nouvelle référence en matière de casque gaming haut de gamme ?
item.description: Audeze annonce officiellement le Maxwell 2, un nouveau casque gaming sans fil pour PC et consoles. Il veut offrir une fidélité audio renforcée, un confort amélioré et une connectivité plus fluide pour les joueurs exigeants.

item.title: Audeze has unveiled the Maxwell 2 gaming headset at CES 2026
item.description: Audeze has unveiled the second generation of its Maxwell gaming headset at CES 2026. The Maxwell 2 is a comprehensive refresh aimed at competitive players and anyone seeking more immersive audio when gaming on PC or consoles. The original Maxwell headset was our pick for best premium gaming headset in 2025. The headline upgrade is Audeze’s patent-pending SLAM technology, which the brand claims improves spatial cues while delivering “punchier” bass. Maxwell 2 pairs that with 90mm planar magnetic drivers, which offer a wide frequency range of 10Hz to 50kHz. Audeze says the result is clearer deta...

item.title: XGIMI's Titan Noir Max 4K projector has a dynamic IRIS for increased contrast
item.description: XGIMI, which burst on the scene in 2025 with several impressive projectors, has unveiled its latest high-end model called the Titan Noir Max. The new model revealed at CES 2026 has many of the bells and whistles found on professional-level projectors including a dynamic IRIS system for improved contrast, along with a new thermal system designed to boost brightness. The Titan Noir Max has a design to XGIMI's Titan model announced last year, but it's taller and a bit squarer with an elegant grille-like pattern on the front. As with other XGIMI models, it features a laser light engine and 4K vide...

item.title: This Pocket-Sized Lab Might Prevent You From Going Into Anaphylactic Shock
item.description: A person goes to the emergency room in the U.S. every 10 seconds over an allergic reaction to food. Could this gadget bring the numbers down?

item.title: Check In for the First Trailer for ‘They Will Kill You’
item.description: Zazie Beetz is a housekeeper ready to clean up with violence in the action-horror-comedy flick 'They Will Kill You.'

item.title: Audeze upgrades its Maxwell gaming headset with magnetic ear pads
item.description: Audeze - the headphone-maker now owned by Sony - announced a refreshed version of its Maxwell gaming headset at CES on Monday, offering roomier ear pads that attach magnetically for easy replacement. The Maxwell 2 for PlayStation is available now for $329, while the Xbox version costs $349, though both support Windows, macOS, Nintendo Switch, […]

item.title: Bosch is taking on Dyson with its first cordless stick vacuums in the US
item.description: Bosch has announced it's releasing its first ever cordless stick vacuum in the US, the Bosch Unlimited 10 and 9. While Dyson tends to dominate the conversation in the US, Bosch has long been a major player in Europe, making its debut in the US cordless stick vacuum market a notable one. Bosch says the […]

item.title: Bosch’s fancy coffee machine is getting Alexa Plus
item.description: At CES this week, Bosch announced the launch of its Personal AI Barista, Powered by Alexa Plus, and teased a new AI-powered cooking feature coming to its connected appliances. Coming to its Bosch 800 Series fully automatic espresso machines, the upgrade allows Alexa users to talk with the machine via an Echo smart speaker "as […]

item.title: Qualcomm’s next-gen Snapdragon X2 laptops are here — and they brought a new friend
item.description: In September, Qualcomm announced the Snapdragon X2 Elite and X2 Elite Extreme, the laptop chips that, it claimed, would be "the fastest and most efficient processors for Windows PCs." They might finally give Intel and AMD a run for their money. Now, CES 2026 is bringing us the first actual laptops based on both that […]

item.title: The HP OmniStudio X’s webcam can watch your work desk
item.description: HP has announced several spec bumps for its 2026 computing hardware lineup at CES, and its all-in-one desktop PCs are no exception. The latest 27-inch OmniStudio X is being updated with Intel's next-gen processors and Nvidia's RTX 5050 GPU with 8GB of VRAM, alongside new features that make it easier to share your work with […]

item.title: HP’s latest OmniBooks are getting chip bumps and OLED screens
item.description: HP has announced a revamped lineup of OmniBook productivity laptops at CES, including its latest AI-focused flagship Ultra model. While pricing and availability haven't yet been revealed, we know the upcoming HP OmniBook Ultra 14 is ditching its previous AMD Ryzen AI 300-series CPUs in favor of Intel's Panther Lake and Qualcomm's Snapdragon X2 series […]...

item.title: The 2026 BMW iX3 voice assistant will be powered by Alexa+
item.description: BMW is finally getting the next-generation Alexa voice assistant and it’s coming with a generative AI upgrade. Amazon said Monday that the 2026 BMW iX3 will be equipped with Alexa+, the same generative AI tech that launched in millions of the e-commerce giant’s smart devices last year. This will be the first vehicle to come […]

item.title: Audeze announces the Maxwell 2 gaming headset, an overhaul of its predecessor, that is targeted firmly at audiophile gamers — and you can buy it now
item.description: The Audeze Maxwell 2 has just been announced by the premium audio brand, and we've got the key details on its upgrades and enhancements right here.

item.title: XGIMI, best known for projectors, launches its own smart glasses
item.description: Projector maker XGIMI has turned up at CES to launch its own range of AR glasses, but don’t get the champagne out too soon. MemoMind is a new brand under which its AI-infused eyewear will be sold, with two distinct units arriving at some point in the near future. The company says it has leveraged its know-how in optics and engineering to produce glasses which are unobtrusively light, all the better for blending into your daily life. Fashionistas will even be overjoyed to learn the glasses’ ship in eight different frame styles, five different temple designs and can be worn with prescription len...

item.title: Brisk It brings its AI cooking tech to an indoor oven at CES 2026
item.description: Brisk It has shown off AI-enabled smart grills at CES before now, but for 2026, the company is taking its cooking tech indoors. With the Neoma multi-function countertop oven, the company offers AI features that can serve as both sous chef and nutritionist, helping you create dishes that fit your budget, diet and other lifestyle needs. The Brisk It Agentic AI can also help with meal planning and grocery orders on top of automatic cooking cycles for recipes it selects. The Neoma has a temperature range from 90 to 450 degrees Fahrenheit and cooking times of one minute up to twelve hours. This mea...

item.title: The HP Omnibook Ultra 14 at CES 2026: Super sleek and surprisingly durable
item.description: At CES 2026, HP is showing off its latest flagship consumer laptop: The Omnibook Ultra 14. It features an all-new super thin design that’s much tougher than it looks. According to HP, the Omnibook Ultra 14 is the “world’s most durably slim 14-inch consumer notebook,” which is a somewhat convoluted way of saying the system remains quite portable — just 0.42 inches thick — while still passing 20 different military standard tests (MIL-STD-810) for things like shock resistance, drops and extreme temperatures. The whole system is crafted from aluminum, though instead of taking a unibody approach l...

item.title: Qualcomm unveils Snapdragon X2 Plus chip at CES
item.description: CES tends to bring a wave of news from chipmakers, and Qualcomm has used this year's event to announce the Snapdragon X2 Plus laptop processor. This is a more modest version of the flagship Snapdragon X2 Elite chip that Qualcomm unveiled in September. The Snapdragon X2 Elite will be available in the coming generation of Windows 11 Copilot+ PCs and its integrated Hexagon NPU can deliver the 80 TOPS performance benchmark for powering artificial intelligence tasks. The chip is also equipped with a third-generation Qualcomm Oryon CPU with either six cores or ten cores. For comparison, the Snapdrag...

item.title: How this startup designed an ultra lightweight EV
item.description: Longbow’s new lightweight EV, out later this year, weighs less than half as much a Nissan Leaf—and less than a quarter of a Chevy Silverado EV. While most EVs tip the scales at several tons, a new “featherweight” electric sports car weighs half as much—or less—than others on the road.

item.title: Cuffing season is here! The best dating apps for serious relationships, reviewed.
item.description: The best dating apps for people looking for a long-term relationship.

item.title: D’immenses étoiles pourraient donner naissance aux trous noirs au cœur des galaxies
item.description: On étudie depuis presque 50 ans ce qui se produit lorsqu'une étoile passe trop près d'un trou noir supermassif. Cela a conduit à des prédictions vérifiées, mais aussi à d'autres qui ne l'ont pas été. Une nouvelle simulation numérique a probablement donné la clé d'une énigme à ce sujet en...

item.title: Ultra léger, puce Qualcomm X2, écran Oled : HP sort le grand jeu avec son nouveau PC OmniBook Ultra 14
item.description: HP a profité du CES 2025 pour annoncer la nouvelle version de son OmniBook Ultra 14. Un ultraportable qui gagne encore en légèreté, configurable avec les dernières puces Intel et Qualcomm ainsi qu'avec un écran Oled 120 Hz.

item.title: Qualcomm X2 Plus : une nouvelle puce ARM à l’autonomie record pour PC portable
item.description: Au CES de Las Vegas, Qualcomm vient de lever le voile sur sa nouvelle plateforme Snapdragon X2 Plus, petite sœur du X2 Elite. Une puce qui se destine à l'entrée de gamme des PC ARM, avec des performances en nette hausse.

item.title: Snap up your first drone for less with this big saving on the DJI Mini 4K
item.description: Get drone ready as the DJI Mini 4K drops to £215 at Amazon.

item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold is a remarkable feat of engineering with serious productivity potential.

item.title: Just announced: Headphones that twist into speakers
item.description: Audio brand TDM announced Neo Hybrid headphones, the first-ever headphones that twist into a portable speaker at CES 2026.

item.title: On ne va pas se mentir : si le robot CLOiD de LG plie vraiment le linge, je l’achète
item.description: LG vient peut-être de tuer le game du CES avant même l'ouverture des portes. Son nouveau concept, la "Zero Labor Home", repose sur CLOiD, un robot majordome aux bras articulés censé gérer vos corvées les plus pénibles. Oui, même le pliage de t-shirts. Trop beau pour être vrai ?

item.title: Quick! The January sales feature up to £400 off our favourite TVs this week – but not for much longer
item.description: The January sales are winding down soon – here are the best TV deals to catch before it's too late.

item.title: Lucid Motors doubled EV output in 2025 after early Gravity SUV struggles
item.description: Lucid built more than 18,000 EVs in 2025 and delivered more than 15,000 after a tough start to the year -- still a far cry from the high bar it set in 2021.

item.title: Here are the best AirPods deals you can get right now
item.description: If you know where to look, you can often score discounts on Apple’s ever-expanding AirPods lineup. Both the AirPods Max and AirPods 4 (with and without ANC) now consistently receive sizable discounts, as do the newer AirPods Pro 3. While recent shopping events like Black Friday and Cyber Monday delivered some of the steepest discounts […]

item.title: LG TVs at CES 2026: A stunning Wallpaper set, glorious Micro RGB colors and a better Gallery TV
item.description: We typically see LG TV announcements a bit before CES, but this year the company had a surprise in store. CES 2026 marks the return of LG's ultra-thin "Wallpaper" TV. The latest version sports a gorgeous OLED screen and wireless connectivity, and it's about as thin as a pencil. We were able to check out the new Wallpaper TV during a CES preview event, along with LG’s Gallery and Micro RGB sets. The company also announced refreshed OLED and LED sets for this year, but it's clear that 2026 will be filled with intriguing TVs for a variety of consumers.LG's 2026 Wallpaper OLED TVDevindra Hardawar ...

item.title: Les astronomes ont eu du mal à y croire : cet amas de galaxie extrême fait vaciller leur compréhension de l’Univers jeune
item.description: SPT2349-56. Depuis qu’ils l’ont découvert, les astronomes s’étonnent de ce qu’ils observent de cet amas de galaxies qui évoluent dans l'Univers lointain. Et ils viennent juste d’y faire une découverte déconcertante de plus. Une découverte qui pourrait remettre en question leurs modèles...

item.title: On a trouvé le Wall-E du CES 2026 : il est mignon, hors de prix et… il n’a pas de bras
item.description: Vous rêviez d'avoir Wall-E dans votre salon ? Zeroth Robotics l'a fait au CES 2026. Le robot W1 a les chenilles, la bouille sympa et un design industriel soigné. Le problème ? Il coûte 5 599 dollars, n'a pas de bras et se déplace très lentement.

item.title: EU gears up for even more tough tech enforcement in 2026 as Trump warns of retaliation
item.description: US Trade Rep says America might have to use "every tool at its disposal" to counter Europe's "unreasonable measures."

item.title: Get $400 off the Jackery Explorer 1000 v2 for a limited time
item.description: As of Jan. 5, you can get the Jackery Explorer 1000 v2 for $398.99, down from $799, at Amazon. That's a 50% discount.

item.title: How to watch the AMD CES 2026 keynote with CEO Lisa Su live
item.description: You'll want to tune into AMD's kickoff for CES 2026 today if you're interested in the company's latest AI development and (possibly) new Ryzen chips. This is where the company will lay out its vision for AI applications across its consumer and enterprise offerings. The presentation — which is the lead keynote for CES 2026 — will be led by CEO Dr. Lisa Su. We'll tell you how to tune in to the livestream and what else you can expect to see. How to watch AMD's keynote live Dr. Su will deliver a keynote speech from the Palazzo Ballroom at the Venetian on Monday, January 5 at 9:30PM ET (6:30PM PT)....
